articles.description: Two-time Grand Slam champion Simona Halep's four-year ban for doping is reduced to nine months by the Court of Arbitration for Sport [Cas].
articles.title: Simona Halep: Doping ban reduced for former Wimbledon champion

articles.description: Defending champions England are drawn with Republic of Ireland, France and Sweden in Group A3 of Women's Euro 2025 qualifying.
articles.title: England to face Rep of Ireland in Euro qualifying

articles.description: Christian Meier rode as a domestique in all three Grand Tours - but locked down and retired, he found a new sporting obsession.
articles.title: Christian Meier: From Tour de France grinder to ultra-running winner

articles.description: Mohammed Ben Sulayem, president of Formula 1's governing body, allegedly told officials not to certify the Las Vegas circuit for its race last year.
articles.title: Mohammed Ben Sulayem: FIA president allegedly told officials not to certify Las Vegas GP

articles.description: Prolific Manchester City striker Erling Haaland says he can still improve despite scoring 80 goals in 84 appearances for the Treble winners.
articles.title: Man City forward Haaland eyes further improvement

articles.description: Luis Enrique says Paris St-Germain must prepare for life without Kylian Mbappe - but can they afford not to play him regularly as they aim for Champions League glory?
articles.title: Can PSG afford to leave out departing Mbappe?

articles.description: Jonny Bairstow says he is set for an "emotional week" as he becomes the 16th man to play 100 Tests for England.
articles.title: Bairstow set for 'emotional' 100th Test cap

articles.description: Sheffield United's first half against Arsenal was so bad, one pundit described it as "one of the worst performances I've ever seen".
articles.title: 'One of worst displays I've ever seen' - Sheff Utd's new low

articles.description: Australian World Cup winners Meg Lanning and David Warner are among the star names entered in The Hundred draft for 2024.
articles.title: Lanning and Warner among stars in Hundred draft

articles.description: Katie Boulter says earning a seeding for Wimbledon is a "huge aim" as the Briton looks to build on winning the biggest title of her career.
articles.title: Katie Boulter targets Wimbledon seeding after San Diego title
